document.bingtitle: Nandos - Review - I feel like chicken tonight!
document.webtitle: Nandos - Review - I feel like chicken tonight!
document.description: ... Food, Great Service, Loyalty Card ... You don't have to book a table for ... to go up to the till to order and pay for your food... a bit like in a fast-food restaurant.
